title: Introduction to the Survival Theory - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Mature   Psychological   Sci-fi   Seinen   Tragedy
tags: Cautious Protagonist   Corruption   Cruel Characters   Hiding True Identity   Male Protagonist   Murders   Past Trauma   Power Struggle   Secret Identity   Soldiers   Survival Game   Tragic Past
author: 미스터쿼카
description:
[…But when I slowly blinked my eyes, I could see only one thing ahead of me.

Yes. That place would surely be my hell.

But at the same time, it would be that bastard’s hell, too.

For that fateful day where I’d get to run into that bastard once more, I chose to willingly throw myself into the Survival Game.]>
